post.author: pieisgood
post.body:
This is just a model I did recently in 3Ds max and Z-Brush... I have a better render but I forgot the link because I have bad memory
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v166/ ... render.jpg


[EDIT]640 width please, ta. kat

post.author: grazzhoppa
post.body:
I will be the first to say it looks like a sperm with hands.

But it the texturing is spectacular. Nice job.

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body:
Nicely done, Pie.
Long time no see.

post.author: kat
post.body: His hands look like they're the 'wrong' way around? It makes the model look kind of odd, as if it's looking out of the back of it's head! Good model otherwise

post.author: pieisgood
post.body:
Yeah, the hands are on "backwards" but... who says they have to be like a humans?

Oh yeah, I made the base model in Max, and then to Z-Brush it went.

Also, the sperm thing, yeah I called it the "spermoid" for a while, then I totaly forgot about that name lol.

word Bloodrayne

post.author: kat
post.body:
pieisgood wrote:
Yeah, the hands are on "backwards" but... who says they have to be like a humans?...
Nobody, but you have to expect comments like that if you use a 'system' that's based on what we know and understand about the world around us; we 'expect' things to follow certain 'rules' so when they don't it doesn't "seem right somehow".

post.author: pieisgood
post.body: I have posted this on many 3D forum sites, 3d total cg talk, I have gotten the whole harang on the hands being backwards thing lol.

post.author: kat
post.body: Ha, there you go... we're a fairly *un*imaginative bunch of people really!!

post.author: pieisgood
post.body: You don't need to be imaginative to run a good site
